did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of the case files of arbitrations, mediations, and disputes between rail carriers and their employees' labor unions in front of various government boards.

controlaccess.corpname: Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Railroad Case Files #5014. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
